import Slider from "react-slick"; const RecommendedCarousel = () => { const settings = { infinite: false, arrows: false, dots: false, slidesToShow: 5, slidesToScroll: 1, speed: 500, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 3, infinite: true, dots: true } }, { breakpoint: 600, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 2, initialSlide: 2 } }, { breakpoint: 480, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 } } ] }; return (
); }; export default RecommendedCarousel;
